txt.en: You have been tasked with defeating Frost-horde Hobgoblin Emissaries and destroying ice pillars spread around the area.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from a scouting mission in the mountains above. A group of Frost-horde Hobgoblin Emissaries were seen creating a series of ice pillars spread around the area. These pillars seem to have been emitting a frosty aura.

'Enter the mountain pass, defeat Frost-horde Emissaries, and destroy the ice passage in the mountain pass!'

'Amongst the windy mountain peaks, ice-giants have forged some sort of pact with the Frost-horde. The hobgoblins have been erecting a series of pillars to reinforce their position.\n\n'Your mission is to defeat Frost-horde Hobgoblin Emissaries and destroy ice pillars so that our forces can push further into the area.
The monster commander in this mission will attempt to summon blizzards.
Your mission is to defeat Frost-horde Hobgoblin Emissaries and destroy ice pillars.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to the mountain pass.
'Well done! With the pass cleared, our forces can continue to push through into the passages further into Gundabad!'
